Inheritance diagram for CEOFException:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 CEOFException (const wxString &desc)

Detailed Description

This exception is thrown when attempts are made at reading past the end of the file.

This typically happens when a invalid packet is received that is shorter than expected and is not fatal.
